lead_paragraph: An Atlantic City casino that says its taxes would rise dramatically under a proposed tax assistance bill designed to help save the struggling seaside resort town says it will sue to block the plan "and blow this whole thing up."

headline.main: Golden Nugget to Sue Over Casino Tax Aid Plan
headline.print_headline: Golden Nugget to Sue Over Casino Tax Aid Plan
